meanings.definition: The quality or state of being baggy.
meanings.sent1: The bagginess of his pants made them look too loose.
meanings.sent2: She adjusted the bagginess of her sweater for a more comfortable fit.
meanings.sent3: The bagginess of the clown's outfit added to his comedic appearance.
meanings.sent4: The bagginess of the clouds signaled an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The bagginess of the fabric made it difficult to sew neatly.

meanings.definition: The extent to which something is baggy.
meanings.sent1: The bagginess of the shirt was perfect for a relaxed day at home.
meanings.sent2: He couldn't stand the bagginess of his socks slipping down his ankles.
meanings.sent3: The bagginess of the balloon animal made it look like a misshapen creature.
meanings.sent4: The bagginess of the map distorted the actual size of the country.
meanings.sent5: The bagginess of the old curtains gave the room a shabby appearance.
